job.command:
umask 2 limit coredumpsize 0 limit starver SL14a STAR_LEVELS pwd set daqfile = &daqFile; set fzdfile=R&runNumber;_$JOBINDEX.fzd set seed=`expr &nIndex; \* 1000` echo &codePath;
ln -s &codePath;/GenerateVertex.C ln -s &codePath;/simWRequest.kumac ln -s &codePath;/closeDecays.F ln -s &codePath;/bfcMixer_pythia.C ln -s &codePath;/.sl64_gcc482
ls -al
/usr/bin/time root4star -q -b GenerateVertex.C\(&nEvents;,$seed,\"@$FILELIST\",\"vertex.txt\"\) > R&runNumber;_$JOBINDEX.log
/usr/bin/time starsim -w 0 -b simWRequest.kumac nevents=&nEvents; config=&sample; run=&runNumber; seed=$seed file=$fzdfile vertexfile=vertex.txt >> R&runNumber;_$JOBINDEX.log
set DbVoption="DbV20140222" set proName="P14iapp510" /usr/bin/time root4star -q -b bfcMixer_pythia.C\(&nEvents;,\"@$FILELIST\",\"$fzdfile\",\"$proName\",\"$DbVoption\",\"W\"\) >> R&runNumber;_$JOBINDEX.log
ls -al
